Key Match Events: Yoane Wissa scored from the penalty spot in the 65th minute to give DR Congo a 2-1 lead
Arthur Masuaku added to his tally with a remarkable goal in the 82nd minute
Post-Match Reflections: DR Congo sealed its ticket to the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) semi-finals with a commanding 3-1 victory against Guinea
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will see DR Congo face host Ivory Coast or Mali in the semifinals on Wednesday next week
Others: DR Congo captain Chancel Mbemba equalized for his team in the 27th minute after conceding a 21st-minute penalty that Mohamed Bayo had converted for Guinea
